TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICurrencyManagerProvider

Docs.summary: Provides custom binding management for components.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This interface allows component authors to provide their own <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> for components that will interact with the Windows Forms data-binding engine. It is rare for a component author to need to implement this interface.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> class provides an example implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ICurrencyManagerProvider>.
Note that for Smartphone applications, this class requires Windows Mobile Version 5.0 software for Smartphones.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager GetRelatedCurrencyManager(string dataMember) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the column or list, within the data source, to obtain the for.
Docs.summary: Gets the for this and the specified data member.
Docs.returns: The related obtained from this and the specified data member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If `dataMember` is `null` or an empty string (""), <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ICurrencyManagerProvider.GetRelatedCurrencyManager%2A> returns the main currency manager for this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ICurrencyManagerProvider>, which is the same currency manager returned from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ICurrencyManagerProvider.CurrencyManager%2A> property.
